inputFields.label: Product description
inputFields.name: productDescription
inputFields.sample: Canva is a graphic design platform, used to create social media graphics, presentations, posters, documents and other visual content. The app includes templates for users to use. The platform is free to use and offers paid subscriptions such as Canva Pro and Canva for Enterprise for additional functionality.

attention-interest-desire-action-aida.title: Attention Interest Desire Action (AIDA)
attention-interest-desire-action-aida.description: Generate sales/marketing copies by applying the renowned AIDA formula

inputFields.label: Product name
inputFields.name: productName
inputFields.sample: Trello
inputFields.placeholder: Enter the product name

inputFields.label: Product description
inputFields.name: productDescription
inputFields.sample:
Trello is a collaborative work management app designed to track team projects, highlight tasks underway, show who they are assigned to, and detail progress towards completion.

At its core, Trello relies on the principles of Kanban project boards to visualize workflows, providing managers and team members with a simple overview of a project from start to finish.

Trello’s key components are boards, lists, and cards.
inputFields.placeholder: Enter the product description

related-topics.title: Related Topics
related-topics.description: Stuck with your content? Input a paragraph and get a list of related topics to cover

inputFields.label: Content
inputFields.name: content
inputFields.sample: Bollywood, an Indian Hollywood, refers to the Hindi-language movie industry in India. The term Bollywood combines Bombay (where most Hindi movies are made) and Hollywood (where most American movies are made). Bollywood makes many movies each year. Many Bollywood movies are called Masala movies.
inputFields.placeholder: Enter a paragraph/snippet of content

paragraph-compression.title: Paragraph Compression
paragraph-compression.description: Generate a short summary of a paragraph keeping the gist, tone, and context intact

inputFields.label: Paragraph
inputFields.name: paragraph
inputFields.sample: With the introduction of a ‘professional portfolio’ by LinkedIn, you can now easily share visual content on your LinkedIn profile to demonstrate your capabilities more than what CVs ever could. From portfolio pieces to presentations to videos, you can now display your work on your profile by importing the content from a webpage or uploading your favorite work pieces straight from your computer. Instead of telling potential employers what you can do, display your work and let it speak for itself.
inputFields.placeholder: Enter the paragraph to be summarized

next-sentence.title: Next sentence

paragraph-rewriter.title: Paragraph Rewriter
paragraph-rewriter.description: Put a new and unique spin to your given content with rewritten versions of it

inputFields.label: Paragraph
inputFields.name: paragraph
inputFields.sample: Most of the people of our country are farmers, workers, and day laborers who live below the poverty line. But the price of essential commodities is soaring higher and higher. It has now become impossible for them to make both ends meet. It has severely hit the day laborers, the lower and middle-class families, and the salaried class too. The prices of rice, vegetables, clothes, mustard oil, medicine, and other essential commodities are also increasing by leaps and bounds.
inputFields.placeholder: Enter the paragraph to be rewritten

inputFields.label: Paragraph
inputFields.name: paragraph
inputFields.sample: The Greek gods were all born from the union between a god and a mortal woman. Zeus was born from the union between his father, Kronos, and his mother, Rhea. Athena was born from the union of Zeus with Metis, or wisdom. Apollo was born from the union with Leto or Artemis. Poseidon was born from the union his father, Uranus, and Gaia, or Earth. Demeter was born from the union her husband, Persephone, and Kore, or Spring.
inputFields.placeholder: Enter the paragraph for summarized list

inputFields.label: Product name
inputFields.name: productName
inputFields.sample: Tumblr
inputFields.placeholder: Enter the product name

inputFields.label: Product description
inputFields.name: productDescription
inputFields.sample: Tumblr is a microblogging and social networking site that allows users to create an online diary or blog. Users can follow their favorite interests, other Tumblrs, and brand influencers to share content to and from. You can reblog posts, photos or videos that you like and share on your blog for your followers to see. Tumblr was relatively popular among tweens and teens in its heyday, circa 2013.
